Title: Remote SQL Server Management Studio
Description:
Code name: RSSMS.
RSSMS will be a simple Silverlight App, with which you will be able to manage your MS SQL server online.
While doing some projects I found it sometimes difficult to work on locally hosted servers. So I always made some simple database manager for that.

This time it will have to be something more generic. The application will have to work for every possible database.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Code name: RSSMS.
RSSMS will be a simple Silverlight App, with which you will be able to manage your MS SQL server online.
While doing some projects I found it sometimes difficult to work on locally hosted servers. So I always made some simple database manager for that.

This time it will have to be something more generic. The application will have to work for every possible database.
